CustomField.formula: IF( ISBLANK(Chains_Supported__c) , "Pending", IF(OR( INCLUDES(Chains_Supported__c, "ETH"), INCLUDES(Chains_Supported__c, "MATIC")) , "Web, Retail & Wallet", "Wallet Only"))
CustomField.inlineHelpText: This field is automatically calculated based on the Chain Supported field.
CustomField.label: Eligibility
